summary.para: Specifies attributes for a user-mode scheduling (UMS) worker thread.
This structure is used with the function.

member.name: UMS_CREATE_THREAD_ATTRIBUTES.UmsVersion
member.summary: The UMS version for which the application was built. This parameter must be UMS_VERSION.

member.name: UMS_CREATE_THREAD_ATTRIBUTES.UmsContext
member.summary: A pointer to a UMS thread context for the worker thread to be created. This pointer is provided by the function.

member.name: UMS_CREATE_THREAD_ATTRIBUTES.UmsCompletionList
member.summary: A pointer to a UMS completion list. This pointer is provided by the function. The newly created worker thread is queued to the specified completion list.
